---
title: "Technology and Relationships in the Guidance Context: an Article Based on a Study of Sustainable Relationships in Guidance Situations Between Teachers and Students in Higher Education"
type: pub
---

Technology and Relationships in the Guidance Context: an Article Based on a Study of Sustainable Relationships in Guidance Situations Between Teachers and Students in Higher Education. I L. Daniela (Red.), <i>Innovations, technologies and research in education, 2019: proceedings of ATEE spring conference</i> (s. 192&#x2013;206). University of Latvia Press. <a href="https://doi.org/10.22364/atee.2019.itre">https://doi.org/10.22364/atee.2019.itre</a></div>
